text: A20 negatively regulates IAV - induced gene expression in BMDM and alveolar macrophages .
( A-B ) BMDM isolated from A20myel-WT and A20myel-KO animals were infected with IAV ( moi 1 ) .

At different hours post infection ( hours p.i . ) cells were lysed and <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IFNbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and A20 mRNA expression was analyzed by qPCR ( A ) .

18 hours post infection cell culture supernatant was analyzed for <extra_id_0> TNF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IFNbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein levels by ELISA and multiplexing technologies ( B ) .
( C-D ) Alveolar macrophages were mock treated or infected with IAV ( moi 1 ) for 18 hours .
<extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IFNbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression was determined by qPCR ( C ) .

Cell culture supernatant was analyzed for <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IFNbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein levels by ELISA and multiplexing technologies ( D ) .
Error bars represent mean values ( +/- SEM ) of 2-3 samples .
Results are representative for 2 independent experiments .
